schedules.name: Simple 8-Session Programme
schedules.description: An aesthetically minimal schedule designed around an eight-week (or session) period of training. Exercises do not have notes or descriptions. Distinct load for each session.

schedules.name: Basic Introductory Programme
schedules.description: A simple, easy to follow layout designed for people who are new to gym training. There is a single load column, and the participant should be instructed to follow the same programming for several weeks in preperation for a more advanced programme. Headings are seperate directions (ie 'Rower - 5m').

schedules.name: Verbose Introductory Programme
schedules.description: A verbose, easy to follow layout designed for slightly more in-depth training. There are seperate columns for sets, reps, rest, and weight. Additionally, there is space for an explainer for each exercise.
